Keynotes announced!

We are pleased to announce the keynote speaker for the upcoming Qualys Security Conference taking place at the Venetian Resort in Las Vegas:

Robert Herjavec

CEO, Cyderes

Globally recognized cyber security leader, and Executive Producer of the Emmy-award winning hit show, Shark Tank

Robert Herjavec is a globally recognized motivational, business, and cyber security leader. For the last 14 years Robert has been well known as one of the Sharks and executive producer of the Emmy-award winning hit show, Shark Tank. He has served as a Cybersecurity Advisor for the Government of Canada, participated in the White House Summit on Cybersecurity and is a member of the US Chamber of Commerce Task Force for Cybersecurity.


Robert’s keynote will highlight the growing importance of cybersecurity in today’s world.


Join us at QSC22 for two days of cutting-edge thought leadership, best practices sharing, and learn security strategies and technology to secure your organization’s digital journey.


There is no cost to attend. Register now to save your spot!


We’re also excited to share this year’s pre-conference training with new course content, check it out and be sure to share the schedule with your colleagues. Hurry, courses are filling up quickly!


Book Now to take advantage of our discounted room rates at the Venetian Resort.


Qualys Security Conference offers:
Industry perspectives from security luminaries
Product updates & use cases from Enterprise TruRisk Platform dev teams
Best practices sessions with your peers
How-to solution demos from Qualys engineers and integration partners
Two days of free training on November 7-8. Must register separately
Take the credit! CPE credits for the training and conference
